00033 #include "Mesquite.hpp"

00041 AddQualityMetric::AddQualityMetric( QualityMetric* qm1, 
00042                                     QualityMetric* qm2,
00043                                     MsqError& err )
00044   : metric1(*qm1), 
00045     metric2(*qm2)
00046 {
00047   if (qm1->get_metric_type() != qm2->get_metric_type() ||
00048       qm1->get_negate_flag() != qm2->get_negate_flag())
00049   {
00050     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Incompatible metrics", MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00051   }
00052 }
00053 
00054 AddQualityMetric::~AddQualityMetric() {}
00055 
00056 QualityMetric::MetricType AddQualityMetric::get_metric_type() const
00057 {
00058   return metric1.get_metric_type();
00059 }
00060 
00061 std::string AddQualityMetric::get_name() const
00062 {
00063   return std::string("Sum(") + metric1.get_name() + ", " + metric2.get_name() + ")";
00064 }
00065 
00066 int AddQualityMetric::get_negate_flag() const
00067 {
00068   return metric1.get_negate_flag();
00069 }
00070 
00071 void AddQualityMetric::get_evaluations( PatchData& pd,
00072                                         std::vector<size_t>& handles,
00073                                         bool free_only,
00074                                         MsqError& err )
00075 {
00076   metric1.get_evaluations( pd, handles, free_only, err );
00077   MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00078   metric2.get_evaluations( pd, mHandles, free_only, err );
00079   MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00080   if (handles != mHandles) {
00081     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Incompatible metrics", MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00082   }
00083 }
00084 
00085 bool AddQualityMetric::evaluate( PatchData& pd,
00086                                  size_t handle,
00087                                  double& value,
00088                                  MsqError& err )
00089 {
00090   double val1, val2;
00091   bool rval1, rval2;
00092   rval1 = metric1.evaluate( pd, handle, val1, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00093   rval2 = metric2.evaluate( pd, handle, val2, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00094   value = val1 + val2;
00095   return rval1 && rval2;
00096 }
00097 
00098 bool AddQualityMetric::evaluate_with_indices( PatchData& pd,
00099                                               size_t handle,
00100                                               double& value,
00101                                               std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00102                                               MsqError& err )
00103 {
00104   double val1, val2;
00105   bool rval1, rval2;
00106   rval1 = metric1.evaluate_with_indices( pd, handle, val1, indices1, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00107   rval2 = metric2.evaluate_with_indices( pd, handle, val2, indices2, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00108   
00109   indices.clear();
00110   std::sort( indices1.begin(), indices1.end() );
00111   std::sort( indices2.begin(), indices2.end() );
00112   std::set_union( indices1.begin(), indices1.end(),
00113                   indices2.begin(), indices2.end(),
00114                   std::back_inserter( indices ) );
00115   
00116   value = val1 + val2;
00117   return rval1 && rval2;
00118 }
00119 
00120 bool AddQualityMetric::evaluate_with_gradient( PatchData& pd,
00121                                                size_t handle,
00122                                                double& value,
00123                                                std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00124                                                std::vector<Vector3D>& gradient,
00125                                                MsqError& err )
00126 {
00127   std::vector<size_t>::iterator i;
00128   size_t j;
00129   double val1, val2;
00130   bool rval1, rval2;
00131   rval1 = metric1.evaluate_with_gradient( pd, handle, val1, indices1, grad1, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00132   rval2 = metric2.evaluate_with_gradient( pd, handle, val2, indices2, grad2, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00133   
00134   indices.resize( indices1.size() + indices2.size() );
00135   i = std::copy( indices1.begin(), indices1.end(), indices.begin() );
00136   std::copy( indices2.begin(), indices2.end(), i );
00137   std::sort( indices.begin(), indices.end() );
00138   indices.erase( std::unique( indices.begin(), indices.end() ), indices.end() );
00139   
00140   gradient.clear();
00141   gradient.resize( indices.size(), Vector3D(0.0) );
00142   for (j = 0; j < indices1.size(); ++j)
00143   {
00144     i = std::lower_bound( indices.begin(), indices.end(), indices1[j] );
00145     size_t k = i - indices.begin();
00146     gradient[k] += grad1[j];
00147   }
00148   for (j = 0; j < indices2.size(); ++j)
00149   {
00150     i = std::lower_bound( indices.begin(), indices.end(), indices2[j] );
00151     size_t k = i - indices.begin();
00152     gradient[k] += grad2[j];
00153   }
00154   
00155   value = val1 + val2;
00156   return rval1 && rval2;
00157 }
00158 
00159 bool AddQualityMetric::evaluate_with_Hessian( PatchData& pd,
00160                                               size_t handle,
00161                                               double& value,
00162                                               std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00163                                               std::vector<Vector3D>& gradient,
00164                                               std::vector<Matrix3D>& Hessian,
00165                                               MsqError& err )
00166 {
00167   std::vector<size_t>::iterator i;
00168   size_t j, r, c, n, h;
00169   double val1, val2;
00170   bool rval1, rval2;
00171   rval1 = metric1.evaluate_with_Hessian( pd, handle, val1, indices1, grad1, Hess1, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00172   rval2 = metric2.evaluate_with_Hessian( pd, handle, val2, indices2, grad2, Hess2, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00173   
00174   indices.resize( indices1.size() + indices2.size() );
00175   i = std::copy( indices1.begin(), indices1.end(), indices.begin() );
00176   std::copy( indices2.begin(), indices2.end(), i );
00177   std::sort( indices.begin(), indices.end() );
00178   indices.erase( std::unique( indices.begin(), indices.end() ), indices.end() );
00179   
00180   gradient.clear();
00181   gradient.resize( indices.size(), Vector3D(0.0) );
00182   for (j = 0; j < indices1.size(); ++j)
00183   {
00184     i = std::lower_bound( indices.begin(), indices.end(), indices1[j] );
00185     indices1[j] = i - indices.begin();
00186     gradient[indices1[j]] += grad1[j];
00187   }
00188   for (j = 0; j < indices2.size(); ++j)
00189   {
00190     i = std::lower_bound( indices.begin(), indices.end(), indices2[j] );
00191     indices2[j] = i - indices.begin();
00192     gradient[indices2[j]] += grad2[j];
00193   }
00194 
00195   const size_t N = indices.size();
00196   Hessian.clear();
00197   Hessian.resize( N * (N+1) / 2, Matrix3D(0.0) );
00198   
00199   n = indices1.size();
00200   h = 0; 
00201   for (r = 0; r < n; ++r) 
00202   {
00203     const size_t nr = indices1[r];
00204     for (c = r; c < n; ++c)
00205     {
00206       const size_t nc = indices1[c];
00207       if (nr <= nc)
00208         Hessian[N*nr - nr*(nr+1)/2 + nc] += Hess1[h++];
00209       else
00210         Hessian[N*nc - nc*(nc+1)/2 + nr].plus_transpose_equal( Hess1[h++] );
00211     }
00212   }
00213   
00214   n = indices2.size();
00215   h = 0; 
00216   for (r = 0; r < n; ++r) 
00217   {
00218     const size_t nr = indices2[r];
00219     for (c = r; c < n; ++c)
00220     {
00221       const size_t nc = indices2[c];
00222       if (nr <= nc)
00223         Hessian[N*nr - nr*(nr+1)/2 + nc] += Hess2[h++];
00224       else
00225         Hessian[N*nc - nc*(nc+1)/2 + nr].plus_transpose_equal( Hess2[h++] );
00226     }
00227   }
00228   
00229   value = val1 + val2;
00230   return rval1 && rval2;
00231 }
